roleset.name: torment or annoy

example.name: rag not followed by preposition
example.text: I keep telling [Stanky *1]to quit [t *1] ragging him.

example.name: rag followed by a preposition
example.text: You've been ragging on that girl ever since she laughed at you about your sneakers.
example.arg: ever since she laughed at you about your sneakers.

roleset.note: Roleset by Katie based on internet search, parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class amuse-31.1.
